item.title: MaxEnt Model
item.description: The Maximum Entropy model, aka MaxEnt model, is a fascinating generative model as it is based on a very intuitive idea from statistical physics - the Principle of Maximum Entropy. The Idea The essence of the MaxEnt model is that the underlying probability distribution $p(x)$ of the random variables $x$ should gives the whole system the largest uncertainty, while producing reasonable observables. item.title: Restricted Boltzmann Machine
item.description: Latent variables introduce extra correlations between the nodes in a network. Introducing hidden units can also help us remove the direct connection between some nodes in a Boltzmann machine and create a restricted Boltzmann machine. A restricted Boltzmann machine requires less computation while having some expressing power. Given Ising like interactions between the nodes, flipping node V1 is likely to also flip node V2 as they are connected through hidden unit H1.
